name: European Capitals and Cities of Sport Federation
membership: Our network of cities awarded is composed by more than 500.
goal: ACES Europe is the European Capitals and Cities of Sport Federation that annually awards the 'European Capital of Sport', 'European City of Sport', 'European Town of Sport', and 'European Community of Sport' titles to cities all across Europe. In addition to conducting its yearly award and evaluation procedures, ACES Europe works regularly with the European Commission on projects for the promotion of sport as well as with the European Parliament and other EU institutions.
interests: Budget, Communication, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Erasmus+ Sport and EWoS
